00014 Thread::Thread(ThreadFunction pfnThreadFunction, void* pInstance)
00015 : m_Thread(0)
00016 , m_Key(0)
00017 , m_pfnThreadFunction(pfnThreadFunction)
00018 {
00019     int ret = pthread_key_create(&m_Key, Thread::onThreadExit);
00020     if (0 != ret)
00021     {
00022         throw logic_error(string("Failed to create thread key: ") + strerror(ret));
00023     }

00026     m_InstancePtrs.pRunInstance = pInstance;

00034 void Thread::start()
00035 {
00036     int ret = pthread_create(&m_Thread, NULL, Thread::onThreadStart, &m_InstancePtrs);
00037     if (0 != ret)
00038     {
00039         throw logic_error(string("Failed to create thread: ") + strerror(ret));
00040     }

00043 void Thread::join()
00044 {
00045     if (m_Thread != 0)
00046     {
00047         pthread_join(m_Thread, NULL);
00048     }
00049 }

00051 void Thread::cancel()
00052 {
00053     if (m_Thread != 0)
00054     {
00055         pthread_cancel(m_Thread);
00056     }
00057 }

00059 bool Thread::isRunning()
00060 {
00061     return m_Thread != 0;
00062 }

00064 void* Thread::onThreadStart(void* data)
00065 {
00066     InstancePointers* pPtrs = reinterpret_cast<InstancePointers*>(data);
00067 
00068     int ret = pthread_setspecific(pPtrs->pThreadInstance->m_Key, pPtrs->pThreadInstance);
00069     if (0 != ret)
00070     {
00071         throw logic_error(string("Failed to set thread data: ") + strerror(ret));
00072     }
00073     return pPtrs->pThreadInstance->m_pfnThreadFunction(pPtrs->pRunInstance);
00074 }
00075 
00076 void Thread::onThreadExit(void* data)
00077 {
00078     Thread* pThread = reinterpret_cast<Thread*>(data);
00079     //pthread_detach(pThread->m_Thread);
00080     pThread->m_Thread = 0;
00081 }
